name: AnchoringComponent.Target
desc: The kinds of real world objects to which an anchor entity can be tethered.

items.name: case world(transform: float4x4)
items.desc: A fixed position in the scene.

items.name: case anchor(identifier: UUID)
items.desc: The AR anchor with a given identifier.

items.name: struct AnchoringComponent.Target.Alignment
items.desc: The alignment of real-world surfaces to seek as targets.

items.name: struct AnchoringComponent.Target.Classification
items.desc: Types of real-world surfaces to seek as targets.

items.name: static func == (AnchoringComponent.Target, AnchoringComponent.Target) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two targets are equal.

items.name: static func != (AnchoringComponent.Target, AnchoringComponent.Target) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two targets are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the target by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the target.
